Struct template has_param

boost::nfp::has_param — has_param<Params,Keyword>::value is true if Params has parameter corresponding to the Keyword

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/test/utils/named_params.hpp>

template<typename NP, typename Keyword> 
struct has_param : public is_same< NP::id, Keyword::id > {
};
